sql:
SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
qty as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM orders

SELECT
userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp
FROM events
WHERE event = 'Add to Cart'

userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp
FROM orders

userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM orders

userId as user_id,
timestamp as timestamp,
amount as value
FROM orders
